name: Nighthawks (itch)
description:
Attempting to flee the city they are trapped in, players are being constantly pursued by a villainous entity. In order to escape, players must make it to the train at the other end of the city to escape before it’s too late...

  • The goal of the game is for the player to escape the city they are being held captive in by means of train
  • Steal money from trash cans and people to gather enough money to buy a train ticket to leave the city
  • Work your way through crowds of people in cramped streets, where anyone of them could be masquerading as the Captor.
  • Traverse a maze-like tangle of buildings where the Captor could be lurking behind every corner
